Title: PERCENT_RANK()
Description: PERCENT_RANK() 函数返回一个介于 0 和 1 之间的数字，表示值小于当前行值的行的百分比。

SELECT
    *,
    PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY n),
    PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY n DESC)
FROM (
    SELECT 5 AS 'n'
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 8
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 5
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 30
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 31
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 32) a;
Examples:
SELECT
    *,
    PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY n),
    PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY n DESC)
FROM (
    SELECT 5 AS 'n'
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 8
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 5
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 30
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 31
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 32) a;
